description: [``botocore``] Remove Discovery APIs from the DataSync service
[``botocore``] This release expands the ModifyInstanceMaintenanceOptions API to enable or disable instance migration during customer-initiated reboots for EC2 Scheduled Reboot Events.
[``botocore``] Enhanced AWS Glue ListConnectionTypes API Model with additional metadata fields.
[``botocore``] This release adds GetClustersForImage API and filter updates as part of the mapping of container images to running containers feature.
[``botocore``] Add IncludeTags field to GetLink, GetSink and UpdateLink API
[``botocore``] The privatenetworks client has been removed following the deprecation of the service.
[``botocore``] This release introduces the new DescribeDBMajorEngineVersions API for describing the properties of specific major versions of database engines.
